articles.author: Ellen Ioanes
articles.title: Swiss senior women win ECHR case - Vox.com
articles.description: The European Court of Human Rights ruled Switzerland’s failures on climate are a human rights violation.
articles.content:
On Tuesday, a group of 2,000 Swiss women won a significant ruling on holding governments accountable for addressing climate change.
